sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *a
sp.p: ai)=r' ai)=re ma=zan w(s ta/xista kanqa/rw|.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *b
sp.p:
i)dou/. do\s au)tw=|, tw=| ka/kist' a)poloume/nw|
kai\ mh/pot' au)th=s ma=zan h(di/w fa/goi.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *a
sp.p: do\s ma=zan e(te/ran, e)c o)ni/dwn peplasme/nhn.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *b
sp.p:
i)dou\ ma/l' au)=fis. pou= ga\r h(\n nu=n dh\ 'feres;
kate/fagen;

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *a
sp.p:
ou) ma\ to\n *di/' a)ll' e)carpa/sas
o(/lhn e)ne/kaye perikuli/sas toi=n podoi=n.
a)ll' w(s ta/xista tri=be polla\s kai\ pukna/s.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *b
sp.p:
a)/ndres koprolo/goi prosla/besqe pro\s qew=n,
ei) mh/ me bou/lesq' a)popnige/nta periidei=n.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *a
sp.p:
e(te/ran e(te/ran do/s, paido\s h(tairhko/tos:
tetrimme/nhs ga/r fhsin e)piqumei=n.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *b
sp.p:
i)dou/.
e(no\s me\n w)=ndres a)polelu/sqai moi dokw=:
ou)dei\s ga\r a)\n fai/h me ma/ttont' e)sqi/ein.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *a
sp.p:
ai)boi=, fe/r' a)/llhn xa)te/ran moi xa)te/ran,
kai\ tri=b' e)/q' e(te/ras.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *b
sp.p:
ma\ to\n *)apo/llw 'gw\ me\n ou)/:
ou) ga\r e)/q' oi)=o/s t' ei)/m' u(pere/xein th=s a)ntli/as.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *a
sp.p:
au)th
 a)/r' oi)/sw sullabw
 th
 a)ntli/an.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *b
sp.p:
nh\ to\n *di/' e)s ko/raka/s ge kai\ sauto/n ge pro/s.
u(mw=n de/ g' ei)/ tis oi)=d' e)moi\ kateipa/tw,
po/qen a)\n priai/mhn r(i=na mh\ tetrhme/nhn.
ou)de\n ga\r e)/rgon h)=n a)/r' a)qliw/teron
h)\ kanqa/rw| ma/ttonta pare/xein e)sqi/ein.
u(=s me\n ga/r, w(/sper a)\n xe/sh| tis, h)\ ku/wn
fau/lws e)rei/dei: tou=to d' u(po\ fronh/matos
brenqu/etai/ te kai\ fagei=n ou)k a)cioi=,
h)\n mh\ paraqw= tri/yas di' h(me/ras o(/lhs
w(/sper gunaiki\ goggu/lhn memagme/nhn.
a)ll' ei) pe/pautai th=s e)dwdh=s ske/yomai
th|di\ paroi/cas th=s qu/ras, i(/na mh/ m' i)/dh|.
e)/reide, mh\ pau/saio mhde/pot' e)sqi/wn
te/ws e(/ws sauto\n la/qois diarragei/s.
oi(=on de\ ku/yas o( kata/ratos e)sqi/ei,
w(/sper palaisth/s, parabalw\n tou\s gomfi/ous,
kai\ tau=ta th\n kefalh/n te kai\ tw\ xei=re/ pws
w(di\ peria/gwn, w(/sper oi( ta\ sxoini/a
ta\ paxe/a sumba/llontes e)s ta\s o(lka/das.
miaro\n to\ xrh=ma kai\ ka/kosmon kai\ boro/n:
xw)/tou pot' e)sti\ daimo/nwn h( prosbolh\
ou)k oi)=d'. *)afrodi/ths me\n ga\r ou)/ moi fai/netai,
ou) mh\n *xari/twn ge.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *a
sp.p: tou= ga/r e)st';

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *b
sp.p:
ou)k e)/sq' o(/pws
tou=t' e)/sti to\ te/ras ou) *dio\s kataiba/tou.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *a
sp.p:
ou)kou=n a)\n h)/dh tw=n qeatw=n tis le/goi
neani/as dokhsi/sofos, to\ de\ pra=gma ti/;
o( ka/nqaros de\ pro\s ti/; ka)=|t' au)tw=| g' a)nh\r
*)iwniko/s ti/s fhsi parakaqh/menos:
doke/w me/n, e)s *kle/wna tou=t' ai)ni/ssetai,
w(s kei=nos a)naide/ws th\n spati/lhn e)sqi/ei.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *b
sp.p: a)ll' ei)siw\n tw=| kanqa/rw| dw/sw piei=n.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *a
sp.p:
e)gw\ de\ to\n lo/gon ge toi=si paidi/ois
kai\ toi=sin a)ndri/oisi kai\ toi=s a)ndra/sin
kai\ toi=s u(perta/toisin a)ndra/sin fra/sw
kai\ toi=s u(perhnore/ousin e)/ti tou/tois ma/la.
o( despo/ths mou mai/netai kaino\n tro/pon,
ou)x o(/nper u(mei=s, a)ll' e(/teron kaino\n pa/nu.
di' h(me/ras ga\r e)s to\n ou)rano\n ble/pwn
w(di\ kexhnw\s loidorei=tai tw=| *dii\
kai/ fhsin, w)= *zeu= ti/ pote bouleu/ei poiei=n;
kata/qou to\ ko/rhma: mh\ 'kko/rei th\n *(ella/da.
e)/a e)/a.
sigh/saq', w(s fwnh=s a)kou/ein moi dokw=.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
w)= *zeu= ti/ drasei/eis poq' h(mw=n to\n lew/n;
lh/seis seauto\n ta\s po/leis e)kkokki/sas.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *a
sp.p:
tou=t' e)/sti touti\ to\ kako\n au)/q' ou(gw\ 'legon.
to\ ga\r para/deigma tw=n maniw=n a)kou/ete:
a(\ d' ei)=pe prw=ton h(ni/k' h)/rxeq' h( xolh/,
peu/sesq'. e)/faske ga\r pro\s au(to\n e)nqadi/:
pw=s a)/n pot' a)fikoi/mhn a)\n eu)qu\ tou= *dio/s;
e)/peita lepta\ klima/kia poiou/menos,
pro\s tau=t' a)nhrrixa=t' a)\n e)s to\n ou)rano/n,
e(/ws cunetri/bh th=s kefalh=s katarruei/s.
e)xqe\s de\ meta\ tau=t' e)kfqarei\s ou)k oi)=d' o(/poi
ei)sh/gag' *ai)tnai=on me/giston ka/nqaron,
ka)/peita tou=ton i(ppokomei=n m' h)na/gkasen,
kau)to\s katayw=n au)to\n w(/sper pwli/on,
w)= *phga/seion, fhsi/, gennai=on ptero/n,
o(/pws peth/sei m' eu)qu\ tou= *dio\s labw/n.
a)ll' o(/ ti poiei= th|di\ diaku/yas o)/yomai.
oi)/moi ta/las: i)/te deu=ro deu=r w)= gei/tones:
o( despo/ths ga/r mou mete/wros ai)/retai
i(pphdo\n e)s to\n a)e/r' e)pi\ tou= kanqa/rou.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
h(/suxos h(/suxos, h)re/ma, ka/nqwn:
mh/ moi sobarw=s xw/rei li/an
eu)qu\s a)p' a)rxh=s r(w/mh| pi/sunos,
pri\n a)\n i)di/h|s kai\ dialu/sh|s
a)/rqrwn i)=nas pteru/gwn r(u/mh|.
kai\ mh\ pnei= moi kako/n, a)ntibolw= s':
ei) de\ poih/seis tou=to, kat' oi)/kous
au)tou= mei=non tou\s h(mete/rous.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *a
sp.p: w)= de/spot' a)/nac w(s parapai/eis.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p: si/ga si/ga.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *a
sp.p: poi= dh=t' a)/llws metewrokopei=s;

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
u(pe\r *(ellh/nwn pa/ntwn pe/tomai
to/lmhma ne/on palamhsa/menos.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *a
sp.p: ti/ pe/tei; ti/ ma/thn ou)x u(giai/neis;

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
eu)fhmei=n xrh\ kai\ mh\ flau=ron
mhde\n gru/zein a)ll' o)lolu/zein:
toi=s t' a)nqrw/poisi fra/son siga=n,
tou\s te koprw=nas kai\ ta\s lau/ras
kainai=s pli/nqoisin a)noikodomei=n
kai\ tou\s prwktou\s e)piklh/|ein.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *a
sp.p:
ou)k e)/sq' o(/pws sigh/som', h)\n mh/ moi fra/sh|s
o(/poi pe/tesqai dianoei=.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
ti/ d' a)/llo g' h)\
w(s to\n *di/' e)s to\n ou)rano/n;

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *a
sp.p: ti/na nou=n e)/xwn;

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
e)rhso/menos e)kei=non *(ellh/nwn pe/ri
a(pacapa/ntwn o(/ ti poiei=n bouleu/etai.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *a
sp.p: e)a\n de\ mh/ soi katagoreu/h|;

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
gra/yomai
*mh/doisin au)to\n prodido/nai th\n *(ella/da.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *a
sp.p: ma\ to\n *dio/nuson ou)de/pote zw=nto/s g' e)mou=.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p: ou)k e)/sti para\ tau=t' a)/ll'.

sp.speaker: *oi)ke/ths *a
sp.p:
i)ou\ i)ou\ i)ou/:
w)= paidi/' o( path a)polipw
 a)pe/rxetai
u(ma=s e)rh/mous e)s to
 ou)rano
 la/qra|.
a)ll' a)ntibolei=te to
 pate/r w)= kakodai/mona.

sp.speaker: *paidi/on
sp.p:
w)= pa/ter w)= pa/ter a)=r' e)/tumo/s ge
dw/masin h(mete/rois fa/tis h(/kei,
w(s su\ met' o)rni/qwn prolirw\n e)me\
e)s ko/rakas badiei= metamw/nios;
e)/sti ti tw=nd' e)tu/mws; ei)/p' w)= pa/ter, ei)/ ti filei=s me.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
doca/sai e)/sti ko/rai, to\ d' e)th/tumon a)/xqomai u(mi=n,
h(ni/k' a)\n ai)ti/zht' a)/rton pa/ppan me kalou=sai,
e)/ndon d' a)rguri/ou mhde\ yaka\s h)=| pa/nu pa/mpan.
h)\n d' e)gw\ eu)= pra/cas e)/lqw pa/lin, e(/cet' e)n w(/ra|
kollu/ran mega/lhn kai\ ko/ndulon o)/yon e)r' au)th=|.

sp.speaker: *paidi/on
sp.p:
kai\ ti/s po/ros soi th=s o(dou= genh/setai;
nau=s me\n ga\r ou)k a)/cei se tau/thn th\n o(do/n.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p: pthno\s poreu/sei pw=los: ou) nausqlw/somai.

sp.speaker: *paidi/on
sp.p:
ti/s d' h( 'pi/noia/ sou)sti\n w(/ste ka/nqaron
zeu/cant' e)lau/nein e)s qeou\s w)= pappi/a;

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
e)n toi=sin *ai)sw/pou lo/gois e)chure/qh
mo/nos peteinw=n e)s qeou\s a)figme/nos.

sp.speaker: *paidi/on
sp.p:
a)/piston ei)=pas mu=qon w)= pa/ter pa/ter,
o(/pws ka/kosmon zw=|on h)=lqen e)s qeou/s.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
h)=lqen kat' e)/xqran ai)etou= pa/lai pote/,
w)/|' e)kkuli/ndwn ka)ntitimwrou/menos.

sp.speaker: *paidi/on
sp.p:
ou)kou=n e)xrh=n se *phga/sou zeu=cai ptero/n,
o(/pws e)fai/nou toi=s qeoi=s tragikw/teros.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
a)ll' w)= me/l' a)/n moi siti/wn diplw=n e)/dei:
nu=n d' a(\tt' a)\n au)to\s katafa/gw ta\ siti/a,
tou/toisi toi=s au)toi=si tou=ton xorta/sw.

sp.speaker: *paidi/on
*trugai=os
sp.p:
e)pi/thdes ei)=xon phda/lion, w(=| xrh/somai:
to\ de\ ploi=on e)/stai *naciourgh\s ka/nqaros.

sp.speaker: *paidi/on
sp.p: limh\n de\ ti/s se de/cetai forou/menon;

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p: e)n *peiraiei= dh/pou 'sti\ *kanqa/rou limh/n.

sp.speaker: *paidi/on
sp.p:
e)kei=no th/rei, mh\ sfalei\s katarruh=|s
e)nteu=qen, ei)=ta xwlo\s w)\n *eu)ripi/dh|
lo/gon para/sxh|s kai\ tragw|di/a ge/nh|.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
e)moi\ melh/sei tau=ta/ g'. a)lla\ xai/rete.
u(mei=s de/ g', u(pe\r w(=n tou\s po/nous e)gw\ ponw=,
mh\ bdei=te mhde\ xe/zeq' h(merw=n triw=n:
w(s ei) mete/wros ou(=tos w)\n o)sfrh/setai,
katwka/ra r(i/yas me boukolh/setai.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
a)ll' a)/ge *ph/gase xw/rei xai/rwn,
xrusoxa/linon pa/tagon yali/wn
diakinh/sas faidroi=s w)si/n.
ti/ poiei=s; ti/ poiei=s; poi= parakli/neis
tou\s mukth=ras; pro\s ta\s lau/ras.
i(/ei sauto\n qarrw=n a)po\ gh=s,
ka)=|ta dromai/an pte/rug' e)ktei/nwn
o)rqo\s xw/rei *dio\s ei)s au)la/s,
a)po\ me\n ka/kkhs th\n r(i=n' a)pe/xwn,
a)po\ d' h(meri/wn si/twn pa/ntwn.
a)/nqrwpe ti/ dra=|s, ou(=tos o( xe/zwn
e)n *peiraiei= para\ tai=s po/rnais;
a)polei=s m' a)polei=s. ou) katoru/ceis
ka)piforh/seis th=s gh=s pollh/n,
ka)pifuteu/seis e(/rpullon a)/nw
kai\ mu/ron e)pixei=s; w(s h)/n ti pesw\n
e)nqe/nde pa/qw, tou)mou= qana/tou
pe/nte ta/lanq' h( po/lis h( *xi/wn
dia\ to\n so\n prwkto\n o)flh/sei.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
oi)/m' w(s de/doika, kou)ke/ti skw/ptwn le/gw.
w)= mhxanopoie\ pro/sexe to\n nou=n w(s e)me/:
h)/dh stre/fei ti pneu=ma peri\ to\n o)mfalo/n,
kei) mh\ fula/cei, xorta/sw to\n ka/nqaron.
a)ta\r e)ggu\s ei)=nai tw=n qew=n e)moi\ dokw=,
kai\ dh\ kaqorw= th\n oi)ki/an th\n tou= *dio/s.
ti/s e)n *dio\s qu/raisin; ou)k a)noi/cete;

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
po/qen brotou= me prose/bal'; w)=nac *(hra/kleis
touti\ ti/ e)sti to\ kako/n;

sp.p: i(ppoka/nqaros.

sp.p: miarw/tatos.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
*(/ellhsin o)rgisqe/ntes. ei)=t' e)ntau=qa me\n

u(ma=s parado/ntes dra=n a)texnw=s o(/ ti bou/letai:

sp.speaker: *trugai=os

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
o(tih\ polemei=n h(|rei=sq' e)kei/nwn polla/kis
sponda\s poiou/ntwn: kei) me\n oi( *lakwnikoi\
u(perba/lointo mikro/n, e)/legon a)\n tadi/:
nai\ tw\ siw\ nu=n w(ttiki/wn dwsei= di/kan.

sp.speaker: *po/lemos
sp.p:
a)po/fere ta\ skeu/h labw\n tauti\ pa/lin:

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
nu=n tou=t' e)kei=n' h(/kei to\ *da/tidos me/los,
o(\ defo/meno/s pot' h)=|de th=s meshmbri/as,
w(s h(/domai kai\ xai/romai keu)frai/nomai.
nu=n e)stin h(mi=n w)=ndres *(/ellhnes kalo\n
a)pallagei=si pragma/twn te kai\ maxw=n
e)celku/sai th\n pa=sin *ei)rh/nhn fi/lhn,
pri\n e(/teron au)= doi/duka kwlu=sai/ tina.
a)ll' w)= gewrgoi\ ka)/mporoi kai\ te/ktones
kai\ dhmiourgoi\ kai\ me/toikoi kai\ ce/noi
kai\ nhsiw=tai, deu=r' i)/t' w)= pa/ntes lew/|,
w(s ta/xist' a)/mas labo/ntes kai\ moxlou\s kai\ sxoini/a:
nu=n ga\r h(mi=n a(rpa/sai pa/restin a)gaqou= dai/monos.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
deu=ro pa=s xw/rei proqu/mws eu)qu\ th=s swthri/as.
w)= *pane/llhnes bohqh/swmen, ei)/per pw/pote,
ta/cewn a)pallage/ntes kai\ kakw=n foinikikw=n:
h(me/ra ga\r e)ce/lamyen h(/de misola/maxos.
pro\s ta/d' h(mi=n, ei)/ ti xrh\ dra=n, fra/ze ka)rxitekto/nei:
ou) ga\r e)/sq' o(/pws a)peipei=n a)\n dokw= moi th/meron,
pri\n moxloi=s kai\ mhxanai=sin e)s to\ fw=s a)nelku/sai
th\n qew=n pasw=n megi/sthn kai\ filampelwta/thn.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os

sp.speaker: *xoro/s

eu)labei=sqe/ nun e)kei=non to
 ka/twqen *ke/rberon,

e)mpodw
 h(mi=n ge/nhtai th

†mh\ ge/nh| pali/gkotos a)ntibolou=sin h(mi=n,†

sp.p:
i)/q', a)ntibolw= s', e)le/hson au)tw=n th\n o)/pa,

kle/ptai ga/r ei)si nu=n ge ma=llon h)\ pro\ tou=.
kai/ soi fra/sw ti pra=gma deino\n kai\ me/ga,
o(\ toi=s qeoi=s a(/pasin e)pibouleu/etai.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s

o(tih\ nh\ *di/a
h(mei=s me\n u(mi=n qu/omen, tou/toisi de\
oi( ba/rbaroi qu/ousi. dia\ tou=t' ei)ko/tws
bou/loint' a)\n h(ma=s pa/ntas e)colwle/nai,
i(/na ta\s teleta\s la/boien au)toi\ tw=n qew=n.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
nai\ ma\ *di/a. pro\s tau=t' w)= fi/l' *(ermh= cu/llabe
h(mi=n proqu/mws th/nde kai\ cune/lkuson.
kai/ soi ta\ mega/l' h(mei=s *panaqh/nai' a)/comen
pa/sas te ta\s a)/llas teleta\s ta\s tw=n qew=n,
musth/ri' *(ermh=|, *diipo/lei', *)adw/nia:
a)/llai te/ soi po/leis pepaume/nai kakw=n
a)lecika/kw| qu/sousin *(ermh=| pantaxou=.
xa)/ter' e)/ti po/ll' e(/ceis a)gaqa/. prw=ton de/ soi
dw=ron di/dwmi th/nd', i(/na spe/ndein e)/xh|s.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p: oi)/m' w(s e)leh/mwn ei)/m' a)ei\ tw=n xrusi/dwn.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:

sp.speaker: *trugai=os

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
spondh\ spondh/:
eu)fhmei=te eu)fhmei=te.

spe/ndontes eu)xo/mesqa th\n nu=n h(me/ran
*(/ellhsin a)/rcai pa=si pollw=n ka)gaqw=n,
xw)/stis proqu/mws culla/boi tw=n sxoini/wn,
tou=ton to\n a)/ndra mh\ labei=n pot' a)spi/da.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
ma\ *di/' a)ll' e)n ei)rh/nh| diagagei=n to\n bi/on,

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:

 to\ sti=fos au)tw=n fai/netai
kai\ pukno
 kai\ gorgo
 w(/sper ma=za kai\ pandaisi/a.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:

sp.p:
a)ll' a)namnhsqe/ntes w)=ndres
th=s diai/ths th=s palaia=s,
h(\n parei=x' au(/th poq' h(mi=n,

sp.p:

w(/ste se\ ta/ t' a)mpe/lia kai\ ta\ ne/a suki/dia
ta)/lla q' o(po/s' e)/sti futa\
prosgela/setai labo/nt' a)/smena.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
a)lla\ pou= pot' h)=n a)f' h(mw=n to\n polu\n tou=ton xro/non
h(/de; tou=q' h(ma=s di/dacon w)= qew=n eu)nou/state.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
w)= sofw/tatoi gewrgoi/, ta)ma\ dh\ cuni/ete
r(h/mat', ei) bou/lesq' a)kou=sai th/nd' o(/pws a)pw/leto.
prw=ta me\n ga\r †au)th=s h)=rcen† *feidi/as pra/cas kakw=s:

ta\s fu/seis u(mw=n dedoikw\s kai\ to\n au)toda\c tro/pon,
pri\n paqei=n ti deino\n au)to/s, e)ce/flece th\n po/lin.
e)mbalw\n spinqh=ra mikro\n *megarikou= yhfi/smatos,
e)cefu/shsen tosou=ton po/lemon w(/ste tw=| kapnw=|
pa/ntas *(/ellhnas dakru=sai, tou/s t' e)kei= tou/s t' e)nqa/de.
w(s d' a(/pac †to\ prw=ton a)/kous'† e)yo/fhsen a)/mpelos
kai\ pi/qos plhgei\s u(p' o)rgh=s a)ntela/ktisen pi/qw|,
ou)ke/t' h)=n ou)dei\s o( pau/swn, h(/de d' h)fani/zeto.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
ou)d' e)/gwge plh/n ge nuni/. tau=t' a)/r' eu)pro/swpos h)=n,
ou)=sa suggenh\s e)kei/nou. polla/ g' h(ma=s lanqa/nei.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
ka)=|t' e)peidh\ 'gnwsan u(ma=s ai( po/leis w(=n h)/rxete
h)griwme/nous e)p' a)llh/loisi kai\ seshro/tas,
pa/nt' e)mhxanw=nt' e)f' u(mi=n tou\s fo/rous fobou/menai,
ka)ne/peiqon tw=n *lakw/nwn tou\s megi/stous xrh/masin.
oi( d' a(/t' o)/ntes ai)sxrokerdei=s kai\ dieirwno/cenoi
th/nd' a)porri/yantes ai)sxrw=s to\n po/lemon a)nh/rpasan:
ka)=|ta ta)kei/nwn ge ke/rdh toi=s gewrgoi=s h)=n kaka/:
ai( ga\r e)nqe/nd' au)= trih/reis a)ntitimwrou/menai
ou)de\n ai)ti/wn a)\n a)ndrw=n ta\s kra/das kath/sqion.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
e)n di/kh| me
 ou)=n, e)pei/ toi th
 korw/new/n ge/ mou
e)ce/koyan, h(
 e)gw\ 'fu/teusa ka)ceqreya/mhn.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
nh\ *di/' w)= me/l' e)ndi/kws ge dh=t', e)pei\ ka)mou= li/qon
e)mbalo/ntes e(cme/dimnon kuye/lhn a)pw/lesan.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:

a)ll' a(/t' w)\n a)/neu giga/rtwn kai\ filw=n ta\s i)sxa/das
e)/blepen pro\s tou\s le/gontas: oi( de\ gignw/skontes eu)=
tou\s pe/nhtas a)sqenou=ntas ka)porou=ntas a)lfi/twn,
th/nde me\n dikroi=s e)w/qoun th\n qeo\n kekra/gmasin,
polla/kis fanei=san au)th\n th=sde th=s xw/ras po/qw|,
tw=n de\ summa/xwn e)/seion tou\s paxei=s kai\ plousi/ous,
ai)ti/as a)\n prostiqe/ntes, w(s fronei= ta\ *brasi/dou.
ei)=t' a)\n u(mei=s tou=ton w(/sper kuni/di' e)spara/ttete:
h( po/lis ga\r w)xriw=sa ka)n fo/bw| kaqhme/nh,
a(/tta diaba/loi tis au)th=|, tau=t' a)\n h(/dist' h)/sqien.
oi(\ de\ ta\s plhga\s o(rw=ntes a(\s e)tu/ptonq' oi( ce/noi
xrusi/w| tw=n tau=ta poiou/ntwn e)bu/noun to\ sto/ma,
w(/st' e)kei/nous me\n poih=sai plousi/ous, h( d' *(ella\s a)\n
e)cerhmwqei=s' a)\n u(ma=s e)/laqe. tau=ta d' h)=n o( drw=n
bursopw/lhs.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
pau=e pau=' w)= de/spoq' *(ermh=, mh\ le/ge,
a)ll' e)/a to\n a)/ndr' e)kei=non ou(=per e)/st' ei)=nai ka/tw:
ou) ga\r h(me/teros e)/t' e)/st' e)kei=nos a(nh\r a)lla\ so/s.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
a(/tt' a)\n ou)=n le/gh|s e)kei=non,
kei) panou=rgos h)=n, o(/t' e)/zh,
kai\ la/los kai\ sukofa/nths
kai\ ku/khqron kai\ ta/raktron,
tau=q' a(paca/panta nuni\
tou\s seautou= loidorei=s.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p: a)ll' o(/ ti siwpa=|s w)= po/tnia ka/teipe/ moi.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
a)ll' ou)k a)
 ei)/poi pro/s ge tou\s qewme/nous:
o)rgh
 ga au)toi=s w(=n e)/paqe pollh
 e)/xei.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p: h( d' a)lla\ pro\s se\ mikro\n ei)pa/tw mo/non.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
ei)/f' o(/ ti noei=s au)toi=si pro\s e)/m' w)= filta/th.
i)/q' w)= gunaikw=n misoporpakista/th.
ei)=en, a)kou/w. tau=t' e)pikalei=s; manqa/nw.
a)kou/saq' u(mei=s w(=n e(/neka momfh\n e)/xei.
e)lqou=sa/ fhsin au)toma/th meta\ ta)n *pu/lw|
spondw=n fe/rousa th=| po/lei ki/sthn ple/an
a)poxeirotonhqh=nai tri\s e)n th)kklhsi/a|.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
h(ma/rtomen tau=t': a)lla\ suggnw/mhn e)/xe:
o( nou=s ga\r h(mw=n h)=n to/t' e)n toi=s sku/tesin.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
i)/qi nun a)/kouson oi(=on a)/rti m' h)/reto,
o(/stis kako/nous au)th=| ma/list' h)=n e)nqa/de,
xw)/stis fi/los ka)/speuden ei)=nai mh\ ma/xas.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p: eu)nou/statos me\n h)=n makrw=| *klew/numos.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
poi=o/s tis ou)=n ei)=nai dokei= ta\ polemika\
o( *klew/numos;

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
yuxh/n g' a)/ristos plh/n g' o(/ti
ou)k h)=n a)/r' ou(=pe/r fhsin ei)=nai tou= patro/s.
ei) ga/r pot' e)ce/lqoi stratiw/ths, eu)qe/ws
a)pobolimai=os tw=n o(/plwn e)gi/gneto.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
e)/ti nu=n a)/kouson oi(=on a)/rti m' h)/reto,
o(/stis kratei= nu=n tou= li/qou tou= 'n th=| pukni/.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
*(upe/rbolos nu=n tou=t' e)/xei to\ xwri/on.
au(/th ti/ poiei=s; th\n kefalh\n poi= peria/geis;

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p:
a)postre/fetai to\n dh=mon a)xqesqei=s' o(/ti
au(tw=| ponhro\n prosta/thn e)pegra/yato.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
a)ll' ou)ke/t' au)tw=| xrhso/meq' ou)de/n, a)lla\ nu=n
a)porw=n o( dh=mos e)pitro/pou kai\ gumno\s w)\n
tou=ton te/ws to\n a)/ndra periezw/sato.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p: pw=s ou)=n cunoi/sei tau=t' e)rwta=| th=| po/lei.

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p: eu)boulo/teroi genhso/meqa.

sp.speaker: *(ermh=s
sp.p: tro/pw| ti/ni;

sp.speaker: *trugai=os
sp.p:
o(/ti tugxa/nei luxnopoio\s w)/n. pro\ tou= me\n ou)=n

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
a)ll' i)/qi xai/rwn: h(mei=s de\ te/ws ta/de ta\ skeu/h parado/ntes
toi=s a)kolou/qois dw=men sw/|zein, w(s ei)w/qasi ma/lista
peri\ ta\s skhna\s plei=stoi kle/ptai kupta/zein kai\ kakopoiei=n.
a)lla\ fula/ttete tau=t' a)ndrei/ws: h(mei=s d' au)= toi=si qeatai=s
h(\n e)/xomen o(do\n lo/gwn ei)/pwmen o(/sa te nou=s e)/xei.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
xrh=n me\n tu/ptein tou\s r(abdou/xous, ei)/ tis kwmw|dopoihth\s
au(to\n e)ph/|nei pro\s to\ qe/atron paraba\s e)n toi=s a)napai/stois:
ei) d' ou)=n ei)ko/s tina timh=sai, qu/gater *dio/s, o(/stis a)/ristos
kwmw|dodida/skalos a)nqrw/pwn kai\ kleino/tatos gege/nhtai,
a)/cios ei)=nai/ fhs' eu)logi/as mega/lhs o( dida/skalos h(mw=n.
prw=ton me\n ga\r tou\s a)ntipa/lous mo/nos a)nqrw/pwn kate/pausen
e)s ta\ r(a/kia skw/ptontas a)ei\ kai\ toi=s fqeirsi\n polemou=ntas,
tou/s q' *(hrakle/as tou\s ma/ttontas kai\ tou\s peinw=ntas e)kei/nous
e)ch/las' a)timw/sas prw=tos, kai\ tou\s dou/lous pare/lusen
tou\s feu/gontas ka)capatw=ntas kai\ tuptome/nous e)pi/thdes,
ou(\s e)ch=gon kla/ontas a)ei/, kai\ tou/tous ou(/neka toudi/,
i(/n' o( su/ndoulos skw/yas au)tou= ta\s plhga\s ei)=t' a)ne/roito,
w)= kako/daimon ti/ to\ de/rm' e)/paqes; mw=n u(strixi\s ei)se/bale/n soi
e)s ta\s pleura\s pollh=| stratia=| ka)dendroto/mhse to\ nw=ton;
toiau=t' a)felw\n kaka\ kai\ fo/rton kai\ bwmoloxeu/mat' a)gennh=
e)poi/hse te/xnhn mega/lhn h(mi=n ka)pu/rgws' oi)kodomh/sas
e)/pesin mega/lois kai\ dianoi/ais kai\ skw/mmasin ou)k a)gorai/ois,
ou)k i)diw/tas a)nqrwpi/skous kwmw|dw=n ou)de\ gunai=kas,
a)ll' *(hrakle/ous o)rgh/n tin' e)/xwn toi=si megi/stois e)pexei/rei,
diaba\s bursw=n o)sma\s deina\s ka)peila\s borboroqu/mous,
kai\ prw=ton me\n ma/xomai pa/ntwn au)tw=| tw=| karxaro/donti,
ou(= deino/tatai me\n a)p' o)fqalmw=n *ku/nnhs a)kti=nes e)/lampon,
e(kato\n de\ ku/klw| kefalai\ kola/kwn oi)mwcome/nwn e)lixmw=nto
peri\ th\n kefalh/n, fwnh\n d' ei)=xen xara/dras o)/leqron tetokui/as,
fw/khs d' o)smh/n, *lami/as o)/rxeis a)plu/tous, prwkto\n de\ kamh/lou.
toiou=ton i)dw\n te/ras ou) kate/deis', a)ll' u(pe\r u(mw=n polemi/zwn
a)ntei=xon a)ei\ kai\ tw=n a)/llwn nh/swn. w(=n ou(/neka nuni\
a)podou=nai/ moi th\n xa/rin u(ma=s ei)ko\s kai\ mnh/monas ei)=nai.
kai\ ga\r pro/teron pra/cas kata\ nou=n ou)xi\ palai/stras perinostw=n
pai=das e)pei/rwn, a)ll' a)ra/menos th\n skeuh\n eu)qu\s e)xw/roun,
pau=r' a)nia/sas, po/ll' eu)fra/nas, pa/nta parasxw\n ta\ de/onta.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
pro\s tau=ta xrew\n ei)=nai met' e)mou=
kai\ tou\s a)/ndras kai\ tou\s pai=das:
kai\ toi=s falakroi=si parainou=men
cuspouda/zein peri\ th=s ni/khs.
pa=s ga/r tis e)rei= nikw=ntos e)mou=
ka)pi\ trape/zh| kai\ cumposi/ois,
fe/re tw=| falakrw=|, do\s tw=| falakrw=|
tw=n trwgali/wn, kai\ ma)fai/rei
gennaiota/tou tw=n poihtw=n
a)ndro\s to\ me/twpon e)/xontos.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
*mou=sa su\ me\n pole/mous a)pwsame/nh met' e)mou=

kai\ qali/as maka/rwn: soi\ ga\r ta/d' e)c a)rxh=s me/lei.
h)\n de/ se *karki/nos e)lqw\n
a)ntibolh=| meta\ tw=n pai/dwn xoreu=sai,
mh/q' u(pa/koue mh/t' e)/lqh|s

nannofuei=s sfura/dwn a)pokni/smata mhxanodi/fas.
kai\ ga\r e)/fasx' o( path\r o(\ par' e)lpi/das
ei)=xe to\ dra=ma galh=n th=s e(spe/ras a)pa/gcai.
